top_categories.workout_context: Gran Fondo Hincapie rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
At 105 miles, Gran Fondo Hincapie punishes athletes who haven’t trained their body to produce power when glycogen runs low.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Gran Fondo Hincapie when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Gran Fondo Hincapie. Make this intensity feel like home.
Racing Gran Fondo Hincapie isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Gran Fondo Hincapie’s south carolina mountains, mixed road/gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Gran Fondo Hincapie’s 7,000ft of climbing demands seated and standing versatility — the ability to change climbing style as gradient and fatigue dictate.
Gran Fondo Hincapie’s south carolina mixed road/gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Every session at Gran Fondo Hincapie intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
At 105 miles, Gran Fondo Hincapie rewards a massive aerobic engine. This volume work builds the fat-oxidation capacity that keeps you moving when glycogen runs low.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what Gran Fondo Hincapie’s south carolina mixed road/gravel delivers on race day.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Gran Fondo Hincapie — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Gran Fondo Hincapie’s 105 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Gran Fondo Hincapie requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on south carolina mixed road/gravel to build confidence. Expect: south carolina mountains, mixed road/gravel, 100+ mile distance.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Durability, and Over Under to prepare you for 105 miles of south carolina mixed road/gravel in Greenville, South Carolina.
